content: from twinkie chan s website > **materials list** > * mc knitpicks brava worsted in caution or a worsted weight yarn in the color of your choice > * cc small amount of worsted weight yarn in a slightly darker color than mc to embroider the face i used cascade 220 > * h8/5 00mm crochet hook > * small amount of polyfill stuffing > * scissors > * tapestry needle
